title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.3 - Operators to be licensed and vehicles registered
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.3 - Operators to be licensed and vehicles registered

State Regulations

No motorized vehicle shall be operated in or upon a
public vehicular parking area, operational area, fuel storage area, public
landing area, public ramp and apron area, public passenger ramp and apron area, public cargo ramp and apron area, or public aircraft parking and storage area
unless: (a) the driver thereof is duly
authorized to operate such vehicle on State or municipal highways of the State
within which such area is located, and unless
(b) such vehicle is registered in accordance
with the provisions of the law of the State in which such area is located or
unless it is especially authorized and registered by the Port Authority to be
operated on such area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
